pkgmetadata.longdescription: API Wrapper for Nasdaq Data Link // Functions for interacting directly with the Nasdaq Data Link API to offer data in a number of formats usable in R, downloading a zip with all data from a Nasdaq Data Link database, and the ability to search. This R package uses the Nasdaq Data Link API. For more information go to https://docs.data.nasdaq.com/. For more help on the package itself go to https://data.nasdaq.com/tools/r.
